duties_responsibilities.duty: Efficiently design, manage, test, implement, and complete projects within specifications and budget.
Design electrical control panels and systems according to project specifications and industry standards.
Coordinate with panel production personnel and develop procedures for testing panels and systems.
Program sophisticated sequences for process control systems and manage multiple projects.
Provide technical guidance and mentoring for others and lead a team in designing and testing software and electrical equipment.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Technical document writing including Testing Procedures, Training Plans, and Sequence of Operations.
Perform as a technical resource for others, providing insight and guidance to solving problems.
Notify management of deadline/budget issues and request quotes from vendors to verify equipment specifications.
Provide customers with technical support via phone, remote access, and onsite service.
Attend training and continuing education related to the industry.
Perform other job-related duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Electrical Engineering, Electrical Engineering Technology or Computer Engineering from an accredited institution (Master's preferred)
